instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the new colors (emerald, cyan, violet, blue) and extend the theme with the 'glass' utilities.

2. GLOBAL CSS: Replace the contents of 'src/index.css' with a new setup that imports the fonts and sets the base dark theme (#030712). Add the custom animations (float, pulse, glow) from the discovery phase but refine them.

3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Go through the Shadcn components in 'src/components/ui' and update their base styles to use the new 'border-white/10' and 'bg-black/40' glass styles instead of the default white/gray.
4. LAYOUT REFACTOR: Update 'HomePage.js' to use the Bento Grid layout. Update 'PortfolioPage.js' and 'AdminPage.js' to use the Dense Linear layout.
5. GLASSMORPHISM EVERYWHERE: Apply the 'glass-card' class (or equivalent Tailwind utilities) to ALL cards, sidebars, and modals. Ensure text contrast is high (white text on dark glass).
6. GRADIENTS: Use the primary gradient (Emerald -> Cyan) for the main CTA buttons and active states. Use the accent gradient (Violet -> Blue) for secondary highlights or 'Pro' features.
7. DATA VISUALIZATION: Ensure all charts (Recharts) use the new color palette. Green for positive, Red for negative, but use the specific Emerald (#10b981) and Rose (#f43f5e) shades.
8. NAVIGATION: Make the top navigation sticky and glassmorphic. It should feel like it's floating.
9. TESTING: Ensure all text is readable against the dark backgrounds. Use 'text-gray-300' for secondary text, never 'text-gray-600'.

do_not: Do NOT use solid gray backgrounds for cards. Always use semi-transparent black with blur.
Do NOT use default blue for links. Use the Emerald or Cyan accent.
Do NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Space Grotesk'.
Do NOT make the design 'flat'. Use subtle borders and shadows to create depth.
must_do: MUST use 'backdrop-blur-xl' for that premium 'frosted glass' look.
MUST add a subtle 1px border (white/10) to all glass elements to define edges.
MUST use the 'glow' effects on hover for interactive elements.
